column1: Little Goat Diner////Our waitress was amazing and recommended the Crispy Shrimp Cocktail. That appetizer had an amazing flavor. For dinner I had the springy shrimp and pork belly
column2: and it was missing something. It was lacking in flavor
column3: and now that I've rechecked the menu I realize it may have been missing the tamarind vinaigrette. The dish disappointed me and it uses the same noodles for sopa de fideo
column4: which has more flavor. For dessert we had the cake do the day
column6: that was amazing! The layered were filled with cookies! The cocktails we had were ask tasty. The main dish was the only disappointment for the night
column7: but overall I may go one more time to give their main dishes a second chance but to also have that amazing appetizer.
